mapper.select: select * from player_baseball where tname=#{param1} order by main asc
select * from player_baseball order by tname
select playernum,pimage,tname,pname,pnumber,to_char(pbirth,'yyyy / MM / dd')pbirth,height,weight,main,pchar,clickup,step,indent from player_baseball where playernum=#{param1}
mapper.update: update player_baseball set clickup=clickup+1 where playernum=#{param1}
mapper.insert: insert into splayer_comment(playernum, writer, ucomment, step, indent) values(#{param1},#{param2},#{param3},#{param4},0)
mapper.update: update player_baseball set step=#{param1} where playernum=#{param2}
update splayer_comment set heart=heart+1 where playernum=#{param1} and writer=#{param2} and ucomment=#{param3}
mapper.delete: delete from splayer_comment where playernum=#{param1} and step=#{param2}
mapper.update: update splayer_comment set ucomment=#{param3} where playernum=#{param1} and step=#{param2}
